name: Deep Deep Dungeon (itch)
description:
Play as this little naked fellow  "Gunkle" as you sink deeper into the depths of An Untitled Dungeon.  Cast spells, learn weapon skills, collect life and mana crystals, and realize the true potential of the weapons you wield as you delve deeper into the ruthless dungeon!

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
Shift to open and close the spell menu
R to open the minimap
Enter to open the inventory (navigate to the bottom to look at your equipment!)
Tab for the "push" command to shove enemies
E to pick up items
If you die and you're on the lose screen, press ENTER to generate a new level

Deep Deep Dungeon is a game I've wanted to make for a while, and it's a game that is the sole reason I've gotten into programming and game development.  Inspired by roguelikes I played because I saw my brothers play some when I was very young, this is a game that I'm very passionate about.  That being said, development has been very difficult recently, and I need to coordinate a large list of things to fix, and implement before I can continue to "Design" this game.  That means I need feedback, so here is a beta!  

Remember, this is a pre beta, not even a real demo!  This exists for the sole purpose of getting feedback on how to improve this game.  The full demo will contain sound effects, and a second dungeon namely, as well as a cleaner UI system, new pixel art, and a lot of new monsters, potions, scrolls, rings, weapons and more!
